name: Ice Wraith

aspects.high_concept: Serpentine Spirit of Frost and Cold

stunts: Frost Touch: Attacks deal cold damage and may create 'Frostbitten' aspect with one free invoke
Snow Camouflage: +2 to Stealth in snowy or blizzard conditions, nearly invisible
Ethereal Form: +2 to defend against non-magical physical attacks
notes: Ice wraiths are elemental spirits of frost that appear as serpentine creatures made of ice and mist. They are nearly invisible in snowstorms and attack with freezing cold. They are sought by Companions for the rite of passage to become full members. Extremely vulnerable to fire.
combat_tactics: Ice wraiths use mobility and camouflage to their advantage, striking from unexpected angles. They fly and weave through the air, making them hard to hit. They flee from fire and concentrate on isolated targets.
scene_triggers: Companions quest: Glory of the Dead
loot: Ice wraith teeth (highly valued by Companions)
